exceptions.tactic: intros i m P i1 v1 i2 v2 k H1 H2.
intros i' m P i1 v1 i2 v2 k H1 H2.
intros i' m' P i1 v1 i2 v2 k H1 H2.
intros i' m' P' i1 v1 i2 v2 k H1 H2.
intros i' m' P' i1' v1 i2 v2 k H1 H2.
intros i' m' P' i1' v1' i2 v2 k H1 H2.
intros i' m' P' i1' v1' i2' v2 k H1 H2.
intros i' m' P' i1' v1' i2' v2' k H1 H2.
intros i' m' P' i1' v1' i2' v2' k' H1 H2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
i: nat
m: nat
P: list (mm_instr (pos m))
i1: nat
v1: Vector.t nat m
i2: nat
v2: Vector.t nat m
k: nat

Goal:
mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) -[ k ]-> (i2, v2) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) -[ k ]-> encode_state (i2, v2)

Premises:
encode_state = fun (n : nat) (c : nat * vec nat n) => ps (fst c) * exp 0 (snd c) : forall n : nat, nat * vec nat n -> nat Arguments encode_state {n}%nat_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Arguments mm_instr _%type_scope Arguments mm_inc [X]%type_scope Arguments mm_dec [X]%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
encode_mm_instr : forall m : nat, nat -> list (mm_instr (pos m)) -> list (nat * nat)
Notation pos := Fin.t
mm_no_self_loops : forall n : nat, nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> Prop
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n :
Module MM := Struct Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Definition mm_instr_rect : forall (X : Set) (P : mm_instr X -> Type), (forall x : X, P (INCₐ x)) -> (forall (x : X) (n : nat), P (DECₐ x n)) -> forall m : mm_instr X, P m. Definition mm_instr_ind : forall (X : Set) (P : mm_instr X -> Prop), (forall x : X, P (INCₐ x)) -> (forall (x : X) (n : nat), P (DECₐ x n)) -> forall m : mm_instr X, P m. Definition mm_instr_rec : forall (X : Set) (P : mm_instr X -> Set), (forall x : X, P
ZMicromega.F = fun (acc : BinNums.positive) (f : EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1) => BinPos.Pos.max acc (ZMicromega.max_var BinNums.xH (fst f)) : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol BinNums.Z * RingMicromega.Op1 -> BinNums.positive Arguments ZMicromega.F _%positive_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
one_step_forward : forall (m i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (i1 : nat) (v1 : vec nat m) (i2 : nat) (v2 : vec nat m), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) → (i2, v2) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) → encode_state (i2, v2)
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[ k' ] -> st
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x p]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (p, v) -[ k' ] -> st
skip_steps : forall (m k : nat) (l r : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (k' : nat) (v v' : vec nat m), mm_no_self_loops (k, l ++ r) -> encode_mm_instr (k + length l) r /F/ encode_state (k + length l, v) → encode_state (k', v') -> encode_mm_instr k (l ++ r) /F/ encode_state (k + length l, v) → encode_state (k', v')
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x p]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[ k' ] -> st
mm_no_self_loops_app : forall (n i : nat) (P Q : list (mm_instr (pos n))), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> mm_no_self_loops (length P + i, Q) -> mm_no_self_loops (i, P ++ Q)
mm_self_loop_no_term_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x i]) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) /MM/ s ↓
fractran_rt_no_zero_den : forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (n y : nat), fractran_regular l -> l /F/ 0 -[ n ] -> y -> y = 0
mm_self_loop_no_term_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x (1 + i); DECₐ x i]) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) \/ s = (1 + i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) /MM/ s ↓
mm_remove_self_loops : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))), {Q : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) | mm_no_self_loops (1, Q) /\ (forall (i : nat) (x : pos (S n)) (j : nat), (i, [DECₐ x j]) <sc (1, Q) -> j < 1 + length Q) /\ (forall v : vec nat n, (1, P) /MM/ (1, v) ↓ <-> (1, Q) /MM/ (1, 0 ## v) ↓)}
fractran_rt_head_not_zero : forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (n y : nat), q <> 0 -> (p, q) :: l /F/ 0 -[ n ] -> y -> y = 0
fractran_compute = fun (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat) => exists n : nat, l /F/ x -[ n ] -> y : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments fractran_compute _%list_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
fractran_rt_no_zero_num : forall l : list (nat * nat), Forall (fun c : nat * nat => fst c <> 0) l -> forall n x : nat, l /F/ x -[ n ] -> 0 -> x = 0
encode_mm_instr_app : forall (m i : nat) (l r : list (mm_instr (pos m))), encode_mm_instr i (l ++ r) = encode_mm_instr i l ++ encode_mm_instr (length l + i) r
encode_mm_instr_in_inv : forall (n i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (el : list (nat * nat)) (c : nat * nat) (er : list (nat * nat)), encode_mm_instr i P = el ++ c :: er -> exists (l : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (rho : mm_instr (pos n)) (r : list (mm_instr (pos n))), P = l ++ rho :: r /\ In c (encode_one_instr (length l + i) rho)
mm_sss_DEC0_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = k /\ w = v
in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (k, v)
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_progress_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
divides_encode_state : forall (i k n : nat) (v : vec nat n), divides (ps i) (encode_state (k, v)) -> i = k
subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st3 -> one_step i st1 st2 -> (fst st1, [i]) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists k' : nat, k = S k' /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3
subcode_sss_steps_stop : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : nat * data), (forall st : nat * data, ~ one_step i st1 st) -> (fst st1, [i]) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st2 -> k = 0 /\ st1 = st2
mm_sss_DEC1_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k u i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]
mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[u/x]) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_progress_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[u/x]) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
in_mm_sss_dec_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (1 + i, v[u/x])
MMA_HALTING = fun (n : nat) (P : MMA_PROBLEM n) => sss_terminates (mma_sss (n:=n)) (1, fst P) (1, snd P) : forall n : nat, MMA_PROBLEM n -> Prop Arguments MMA_HALTING {n}%nat_scope
MMA_HALTS_ON_ZERO = fun (n : nat) (P : MMA_PROBLEM n) => sss_output (mma_sss (n:=n)) (1, fst P) (1, snd P) (0, vec_zero) : forall n : nat, MMA_PROBLEM n -> Prop Arguments MMA_HALTS_ON_ZERO {n}%nat_scope
Inductive mm_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mm_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), INCₐ x // (i, v) -1> (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (1 + i, v[u/x]) Arguments mm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments divides (_ _)%nat_scope
sss_steps_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (k : nat) (st1 st3 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> (k = 0 /\ st1 = st3) + {k' : nat | exists st2 : nat * data, k = S k' /\ sss_step one_step P st1 st2 /\ sss_steps one_step P k' st2 st3}
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) ->...-> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) ->...-> P m m0 m1
in_sss_step : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (st1 st2 : nat * data), fst st1 = k + length l -> one_step i st1 st2 -> sss_step one_step (k, l ++ i :: r) st1 st2
mm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) ->...-> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) ->...-> P m m0 m1

```coq
intros i m P i1 v1 i2 v2 k H1 H2.
unfold mm_no_self_loops in H1.
intros H3 H4.
unfold encode_mm_instr.
rewrite H2 in H4.
apply H1 in H4 as H5.
unfold encode_state.
rewrite H5.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros i m P i1 v1 i2 v2 k H1 H2. unfold mm_no_self_loops in H1. intros H3 H4. unfold encode_mm_instr. rewrite H2 in H4. apply H1 in H4 as H5. unfold encode_state. rewrite H5. reflexivity.
